full_text: Hachimura Rui and Osaka Naomi are part of a cohort of prominent mixed­-race athletes who are forcing Japan to reckon with its racial diversity https://t.co/4OeWJweT2F

localize.full_text: 八村塁と大坂なおみは、日本に人種的多様性の見直しを迫る著名な混血アスリートたちの一人である。https://t.co/4OeWJweT2F
